item.title: Travis add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right." -- Henry Ford

item.title: Travis add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Travis add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Travis add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "The man with no imagination has no wings." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Travis add a quote by Ali Bin Abi Thalib
item.description: "He who has a thousand friends has not a friend to spare, And he who has one enemy will meet him everywhere. " -- Ali Bin Abi Thalib

item.title: Travis add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Travis add a quote by Ali Ibn Abu Talib
item.description: "He who is greedy is disgraced; he who discloses his hardship will always be humiliated; he who has no control over his tongue will often have to face discomfort." -- Ali Ibn Abu Talib

item.title: Travis add a quote by Ali Ibn Abu Talib
item.description: "Do not feel ashamed if the amount of charity is small because to refuse the needy is an act of greater shame." -- Ali Ibn Abu Talib

item.title: Travis add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Travis add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Travis add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
